GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of given user

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of given article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates and returns an object of given article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a given article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts given comment and serves an object of given comment

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates and serves an object of given comment
